text: Tlalpan () is a borough (demarcación territorial) in Mexico City. It is the largest borough. The rest, almost all of it on the northern edge, has been urban since the mid-20th century. When it was created in 1928, it was named after the most important settlement of the area, Tlalpan, which is known as “Tlalpan center”. ==References== Category:Municipalities of Mexico City
title: Tlalpan
